title: Man makes rare discovery while fishing
description: A man in South Dakota found a 90-million-year-old fish fossil while competing in a fishing tournament. HLN's Robin Meade shares details of Andy Moore's historic catch.

title: Climate change to blame for parched 'Garden of Eden'
description: Once named the "Garden of Eden," the lush green marshlands of southern Iraq have turned into a desolate desert. CNN's Jomana Karadsheh reports.

title: California expected to ban new gas car sales by 2035, with Thursday vote
description: California air regulators are expected Thursday to issue stringent rules to ban the sale of new gasoline cars by 2035 and set interim targets to phase the cars out.

title: Rural cancer patients struggle with cost and distance to access promising cancer treatment
description: Suzanne BeHanna initially turned down an experimental but potentially lifesaving cancer treatment.

title: My prime minister was filmed dancing at a party. Why is the world scandalized?
description: It is the talk of Finland's coffee shops, its iconic saunas and of newspaper headlines: What are people in this Nordic country to think about our Prime Minister Sanna Marin, after a viral video this month showed her dancing and singing with reckless abandon?

title: See how the streets of Kyiv look on Independence Day
description: Ukraine's Independence Day this year, which marks 31 years since the country broke with the Soviet Union, is set to be a somber affair as officials warn that Russia may carry out missile attacks against Ukrainian cities. CNN's David McKenzie reports from Kyiv, Ukraine.

title: Meet the former Twitter exec blowing the whistle on the company
description: Nearly 25 years ago, a young computer programmer named Peiter "Mudge" Zatko told Congress that the internet was woefully insecure. A big part of the issue, Zatko told a Senate panel, was that software and e-commerce companies "want to ignore problems as long as possible. It's cheaper for them."

title: Solar power is booming in Germany as Russia turns down the gas
description: People on the frontlines of Europe's gas crisis are scrambling to get solar panels for their homes and businesses as they confront a "perfect storm" that's sending energy prices to record levels.

title: Biden orders airstrikes against Iranian-backed groups in Syria following attacks near base holding US troops last week
description: President Joe Biden ordered airstrikes against Iranian-backed groups in Syria on Tuesday, a little over a week after a number of rockets struck near a military base in northeastern Syria housing US troops.

title: Japan turns back to nuclear power in significant policy shift as fuel prices soar
description: Prime Minister Fumio Kishida said Wednesday Japan will restart idled nuclear plants and consider developing next-generation reactors, in a policy reversal that will see the nation turn back toward atomic energy as fuel prices soar worldwide.

title: Ukraine marks Independence Day with wary eye on Russia
'Extremely rare' discoveries are helping archaeologists paint a picture of this 2,000-year-old Roman temple
description: Cupra Marittima, in Italy's Marche region, is today a sleepy seaside town -- but it was once a thriving and powerful outpost of the Roman Empire.

title: Russia's war in Ukraine hasn't gone to plan, but Putinism is alive and well
Key takeaways from primaries in Florida, New York and Oklahoma runoffs
A treasured manuscript in a college library that was believed to have been written by Galileo is a forgery, university says
description: A prized manuscript in the University of Michigan library that was believed to have been written by the famed Italian astronomer Galileo Galilei is a forgery, the university said.

title: Hear Dugina's father deliver emotional speech at daughter's funeral
description: Alexander Dugin, a Russian philosopher and a close ally of President Putin, gave an emotional speech at a memorial service for his daughter Darya Dugina who was killed in a car bombing. CNN's Frederik Pleitgen has more.

title: Six months have passed since the Russian President launched his unprovoked invasion, with disastrous losses for Russia — but it hasn't hit his popularity
Angola at a crossroads as citizens vote in presidential election
description: Voters in the oil-rich African nation of Angola will go to the polls on Wednesday to decide who will lead the country -- the party that has been in power for nearly five decades, or an opposition promising a fresh start especially for disaffected youth.

title: Indian billionaire makes hostile bid for high-profile NDTV news channel
description: Asia's richest man has launched a hostile bid to take over an influential broadcaster in India and gain a firmer footing in the country's vibrant media space.

title: How 24 British rabbits took over Australia
description: What seemed like an innocent Christmas gift of 24 English rabbits in 1859 would go on to become Australia's "most devastating biological invasion," according to a new study by the Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences.

title: Kevin Durant to remain with Brooklyn Nets, team management says
description: Brooklyn Nets All-Star forward Kevin Durant will remain with the franchise, general manager Sean Marks said on Tuesday.

title: Dugongs functionally extinct in Chinese waters, study finds
description: The dugong, a gentle marine mammal that has frequented China's southern waters for hundreds of years, has become functionally extinct in the country, a new study said on Wednesday.

title: They met on a promenade in Nice. Now this couple makes a living traveling in a world of sounds
description: Seven years ago, American Libby Green was traveling with her mom in Italy and France, capping off their trip with a visit to the southern French Mediterranean resort city of Nice before flying back to the US.

title: Video: Giant slide in Detroit launches kids into the air
description: A giant slide at a park in Detroit closed on the same day it opened after children were catapulted into the air while attempting to slide down.

title: Judge orders Trump to explain request for 'special master' for Mar-a-Lago documents
Cruise ship rescues Cuban migrants stranded at sea
description: Six Cuban migrants adrift at sea on a makeshift raft were rescued by a cruise ship last week, video shared with CNN shows.

title: Key takeaways from US primaries
description: • Nadler wins Democratic primary in clash between incumbents, CNN projects

title: 'Incomprehensible': Conway reacts to Trump team's leaked letter
description: George Conway discusses the leak of a letter from the National Archives (NARA) to former President Trump's team that outlined NARA's intention to share hundreds of pages of classified material it had retrieved with the FBI.

title: Analysis: Why Ukraine frets about US commitment to the war
description: Six months after Russia's unprovoked invasion, the war in Ukraine hasn't gone away despite being overtaken in US headlines by former President Donald Trump and inflation. The stakes have not changed; they are as important now as ever. And if anything, the war is more brutal and bloody and may be primed for an escalation that could again test American policy.

title: India fires three officers for accidentally launching missile into Pakistan
description: The Indian Air Force said on Tuesday the government had sacked three officers for accidentally firing a missile into Pakistan in March, an incident that the two nuclear-armed rivals handled calmly as there were no casualties.

title: India's top court to hear petition against release of 11 men who gang-raped pregnant Muslim
description: India's Supreme Court will hold a hearing on a petition challenging the release last week of 11 Hindu men convicted of the gang rape of a pregnant Muslim woman during Hindu-Muslim riots in 2002 in the western state of Gujarat.

title: 'I cried watching my daughter,' says father of woman who drowned while livestreaming on Facebook
description: The father of a Kenyan woman who drowned in a swimming pool in Canada while livestreaming on Facebook has spoken of his family's loss.

title: Jury convicts two men of conspiring to kidnap Michigan governor
description: A federal jury on Tuesday found two men guilty of conspiring to kidnap Michigan Gov. Gretchen Whitmer in 2020.

title: 'We need more sophisticated weaponry': CNN speaks exclusively to Ukraine Defense Minister
description: CNN's Sam Kiley sits down with Ukraine Defense Minister Oleksiy Reznikov six months after Russia's invasion of Ukraine.

title: Tesla owner has his car key implanted in his hand
description: Are you the type who has trouble keeping track of your car keys? A Michigan man has solved that problem by turning himself into a key. CNN's Jeanne Moos reports.
